title: Workshop on Strengthening Online Learning Academic Load Management Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Online education experience and understanding of fundamental instructional design concepts
context.additional_context: Targeting secondary social studies teachers with online instruction experience. Environment enabling personal device utilization and project-based assessments.

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more online learning activity plans by applying the LATARE framework.
Learners can establish project plans that improve time efficiency by 20% or more using academic workload management strategies.
Learners can present revised designs achieving 80% or higher validity for their instructional plans based on peer feedback.

resources: Sample online learning platform for practical training

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
